title: Marc Andreessen on Software, Immortality, and Bitcoin
description: What's the single best thing happening in technology right now? According to entrepreneur and venture capitalist Marc Andreessen, it's the ability to live in rural Wisconsin but still earn a Silicon Valley salary. Andreessen also explains to EconTalk host Russ Roberts why software is still eating the world, why he's an optimist, and why he's still bullish on Bitcoin and the blockchain.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
